alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 09 at 11:10AM EST until February 13 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Shawneetown. .Recent precipitation cause the Ohio River to rise. At Shawneetown, the river is in minor flood, and is forecast to crest at 35.8 feet Friday morning. It will not fall below flood stage until Sunday morning. For the Ohio River...including Shawneetown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Shawneetown. * WHEN...Until late Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 34.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 35.8 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
